name: Saint Friday the 13th's Massacre
description:
MADE FOR A 48 HOUR GAMEJAM

In a world, where a sudden virus outbreak appears. Only one man was prepared for this and any other scenario, you could ever think to throw at him.

Can you repel the unknown enemies and stop the virus from spreading.

Controls:

WASD - Movement.

Mouse - Rotation

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Mouse Right Click - (Pistol) Aim

Key 1 or 2 for weapons.
